data.title: Always something interesting and unique
data.text: I love to go and browse around and usually shop here for all gifts here for my friends because there's always something different that you can't find just anywhere. The owner is super sweet and if there's something special you're looking for, just ask. She would love to help you.

data.title: Best place to shop in Springdale
data.text: I have been to this store a few times and I have to say this is the best vintage/antique shop to go.  Lots of vintage and antiques mixed with repurposed items.  The shop owner was very nice and kind and even offered to make me a deal on a few items.  Definitely worth the trip when I go and I always try to go back.  If you are into interior decorating and want to do it for a steel this is the place to go.  If you just love looking at old and things from days gone by then this is the place too.  I have never seen the same thing twice.  She says she brings new items in daily and I believe it.  I don't think you will leave empty handed when you go here, I never do.
